Run each resume data pre-processing step in sequence.

Source: R/prepare.R
preprocess_entries.Rd

Run each resume data pre-processing step in sequence.

Usage

preprocess_entries(
  entry_data,
  style = c("markdown", "latex", "txt"),
  order = c("chronological", "reversed"),
  bullet_style = c("-", "+"),
  use_abridged = FALSE,
  sort_appended = FALSE,
  skill_set_sorted = NULL
)

See also

Other pipeline: preprocess_contacts(), preprocess_text()
